job.title: Test Automation - Software Engineer
job.description: stronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongImportant Note During the application process ensure your contact information email and phone number is up to date and upload your current resume when submitting your application for consideration To participate in some selection activities you will need to respond to an invitation The invitation can be sent by both email and text message In order to receive text message invitations your profile must include a mobile phone number designated as Personal Cell or Cellular in the contact information of your applicationbrbrAt Wells Fargo we are looking for talented people who will put our customers at the center of everything we do We are seeking candidates who embrace diversity equity and inclusion in a workplace where everyone feels valued and inspiredbrbrHelp us build a better Wells Fargo It all begins with outstanding talent It all begins with youbrbrTechnology sets IT strategy enhances the design development and operations of our systems optimizes the Wells Fargo infrastructure provides information security and enables Wells Fargo global customers to have 24 hours a day 7 days a week banking access through inbranch online ATMs and other channelsbrbrOur mission is to deliver stable secure scalable and innovative services at speeds that delight and satisfy our customers and unleash the skills potential of our employeesbrbrThis position will be a Software Engineer supporting our Community Banking Gateway application Community Banking Voltron application and the Community Banking Data Warehouse CBDW application The Gateway application supports Community Banking reports The Voltron application stores data used for Community Banking reporting CBDW is a data application system which holds Community Bank data such as product sales data customer experience data and incentive databrbrstronguResponsibilities IncludebrustrongulliWork with the product owner and business stakeholders to identify solutions to business needsliliAttend all Kanban andor agile team meetings including the daily stand ups Be an agile championliliWrite and maintain all required project documentation needed such as Write submit and manage testing defectsliliAssist in automating unitsystem testsliliConduct validation in our production environmentliliWrite maintain and manage all required test documentationliliConduct business analysis as neededliliProviding CBDW application end user supportliliPerform web content changesliliActs in a lead technical role providing technical guidance and consultation with application teams clients and Engineering Managers for their technology domain environments including but not limited to cloud middleware operating systems applications SoftwareasaService and PlatformasaService products liliDesign code test debug and document programs using agile development practices liliProvides the strategy and design for projects associated with communication tools needed to support projected transaction volumes response time and system availability targets liliMay provide guidance and direction to less experienced staff in resolution of
